hero.headline: Modern perfumery rooted in oud tradition. Conceived in Montreal.
hero.subtitle: Four Signature Blends. Each one a deliberate statement of character.

sections.title: Origin
sections.body: QADIR Montreal was founded at the intersection of two traditions: the ancient art of oud-based perfumery from the Arabian Gulf, and the modern restraint of Montreal's creative culture. The result is a fragrance house that treats scent as architecture — where every note is placed with deliberate intent, and silence between notes matters as much as the notes themselves.

sections.title: Philosophy
sections.body: We believe luxury is not decoration — it is confidence. Our four Signature Blends are not products; they are statements. Each blend carries a name rooted in Arabic, a role within the collection, and an olfactive profile designed to evolve on skin over hours. We do not chase trends. We craft permanence.
